TestCurrentTimeUpdatedAfterInlineSeek()

Tests the case where a seek call can be run inline due to already being on the audio thread. Because it's immediately executed, a Bass.Update() call is not required before the channel's state is updated.

[Test]
public void TestCurrentTimeUpdatedAfterInlineSeek()

Tests the case where a start call can be run inline due to already being on the audio thread. Because it's immediately executed, a Bass.Update() call is not required before the channel's state is updated.

Tests the case where a stop call can be run inline due to already being on the audio thread. Because it's immediately executed, a Bass.Update() call is not required before the channel's state is updated.

TestStartFromEndDoesNotRestart()

Bass restarts the track from the beginning if Start is called when the track has been completed. This is blocked locally in TrackBass, so this test expects the track to not restart.

[Test]
public void TestStartFromEndDoesNotRestart()
